prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a gentle demeanor and a shell on its back.
Show me an aquatic creature that has a serene expression and blue scales.
Imagine a Pokemon that can glide through water effortlessly and has a playful personality.
Generate a creature resembling a sea dinosaur with a friendly vibe and large flippers.
Design a Pokemon that radiates calmness, with a unique shell feature and a light blue color.
Make a Pokemon that can travel across oceans, featuring distinct wave patterns on its body.
Give me a hybrid Pokemon that combines characteristics of a turtle and a whale.
